lastfm.summary: [BLOCKCODE] Denkmal - Wir sind Helden Last.fm Song Link Release Date "Denkmal" was released in 2003 as part of the album "Die Reklamation". Recording Details The song was recorded in 2002 and features the distinctive indie rock sound that Wir sind Helden is known for. The recording took place in Germany, with a focus on combining traditional rock instruments with a modern, edgy production style. Genre The song is categorized under Indie Rock and German Pop. It is known for its catchy melody and thought-provoking lyrics. Read more on Last.fm.
